title: #223 -  Danish & O'neill & ME
description:
Comedians Jeff Danis & Ryan O'neill stop by the Mancave to talk to me about their favorite stories from Mixed Martial Artists, Ari Shaffir and his epic disappearance into Asia, my wife stops in and we talk about O'neill's dyslexia, their past drunken experiences on the Bertcast, I read the last letter Ari wrote to me & Tom Segura, & Comedy Central Roast Battle Champion Frank Castillo calls in!!! 

 

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
